Package org.zoolu.net

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TcpConnectionListener
    Listener for TcpConnection events.
    TcpServerListener
    Listener for TcpServer events.
    UdpProviderListener
    Listener for UdpProvider events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IpAddress
    IpAddress is an IP address.
    SocketAddress
    A SocketAddress is a pair { address, port }.
    TcpConnection
    TcpConnection provides a TCP connection oriented transport service.
    TcpServer
    TcpServer implements a TCP server wainting for incoming connection.
    TcpSocket
    TcpSocket provides a uniform interface to TCP transport protocol, regardless J2SE or J2ME is used.
    UdpPacket
    UdpPacket provides a uniform interface to UDP packets, regardless J2SE or J2ME is used.
    UdpProvider
    UdpProvider provides an UDP send/receive service.
    UdpSocket
    UdpSocket provides a uniform interface to UDP transport protocol, regardless J2SE or J2ME is used.
